input.description:
Input XML of the format below. Note presence of double-quotes (") in the value of the input. These double-quotes are escaped in the output:
<inputParameters> <inputParameter> <name>adapter name</name> <value>text with double-quotes - "</value> </inputParameter> <inputParameter> <name>target connection data</name> <value> <connection-details> <hostname>blah.doodle.com</hostname> <username>somename</username> <password> <EncryptedData Type="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#Content"> <CipherData> <CipherValue>some-enrypted-data</CipherValue> </CipherData> </EncryptedData> </password> <invocation-mechanism>ssh</invocation-mechanism> <timeout>120</timeout> <adapter-name>SSHAdapter</adapter-name> </connection-details> </value> </inputParameter> </inputParameters>

name="q" select="'"'" /> <xsl:variable name="eq" select="'\\"'" /> <xsl:variable name="empty"> <xsl:text></xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="rootElemName" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(/*/*)"> <xsl:variable name="xmlStr"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" mode="nodetostring" /> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="escapedXmlStr" select="java:replaceAll(java:new($xmlStr), $q, $eq)" /> <value> <xsl:value-of select="$escapedXmlStr" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:element name="{$rootElemName}"> <xsl:value-of select=" java:replaceAll(java:new(.), $q, $eq)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template mode="selfclosetag" match="*"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"><</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="name()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*" mode="attribs" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">/></xsl:text> </xsl:template> <xsl:template mode="opentag" match="*"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"><</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="name()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="." mode="namespace" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*" mode="attribs" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">></xsl:text> </xsl:template> <xsl:template mode="closetag" match="*"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"></</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="name()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">></xsl:text> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="* | text()" mode="nodetostring"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(name())"> <xsl:choose> <!--if element is not empty--> <xsl:when test="normalize-space(.) != $empty or *"> <xsl:apply-templates select="." mode="opentag" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="* | text()" mode="nodetostring" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="." mode="closetag" /> </xsl:when> <!-- assuming emty tags are self closing, e.g. <img/>, <source/>, <input/>--> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:apply-templates select="." mode="selfclosetag" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:when> <!--Just text--> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="java:replaceAll(java:new(.), $q, $eq)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*" mode="attribs"> <xsl:if test="position() = 1"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="concat(name(), '=', $q, java:replaceAll(java:new(.), $q, $eq) , $q)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:if test="position() != last()"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="*" mode="namespace"> <xsl:if test="name(.) = 'EncryptedData'"> <xsl:if test="position() = 1"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="concat('xmlns', '=', $q, java:replaceAll(java:new(namespace-uri(.)), $q, $eq) , $q)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:if test="position() != last()"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description:
Given an input XML as below, the process will output string suitable to be used as value in a JSON data.
Note: double quotes are escaped and XML values are converted into XML strings.
<EncryptedData xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc" Type="http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#Content"> <CipherData> <CipherValue>some-enrypted-data</CipherValue> </CipherData> </EncryptedData>
OUTPUT:
<EncryptedData xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc\" Type=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#Content\"><CipherData><CipherValue></CipherValue></CipherData></EncryptedData></password><invocation-mechanism></invocation-mechanism><timeout>120</timeout><adapter-name>SSHAdapter</adapter-name></connection-details>
